name: CII Recognition of Prior Learning (RPL) Mapping for Insurance Institute of India (III) Qualifications
description: Tabular dataset from the article 'How Can III Graduates (LII, AIII, FIII) Fast-Track International CII Insurance Careers' showing how III diplomas and modules map to CII Recognition of Prior Learning (RPL) exemptions and non-unit-specific credits.
keywords: Insurance Institute of India to CII mapping

isPartOf.name: RegDEEP™ - Regulatory Decoding & Explanation for Exam Purpose™
III Licentiate, Associate & Fellowship Exam Prep | Online Mock Tests
isPartOf.description: Prepare for the Insurance Institute of India (III) Licentiate, Associateship, and Fellowship exams with GurukulOnRoad’s trusted exam prep solutions. Access a full suite of online mock tests, IRDA-aligned guide books, eBooks, and personalized coaching to confidently pass key modules like IC-01, IC-11, IC-45, and IC-86. Whether you’re starting with Licentiate or aiming for Fellowship, our platform supports your complete insurance certification journey.

isPartOf.headline: CII Recognition of Prior Learning (RPL) for III Graduates (LIII, AIII, FIII): How Indian Insurance & BPO/KPO/GCC Professionals Can Fast-Track Global CII Insurance Careers
isPartOf.description: III LIII AIII FIII holders & insurance professionals in BPO, KPO, GCC units can Fast-Track CII qualifications through RPL, gain exemptions & credits, in 2026

isBasedOn.name: Guidelines for building on Insurance Institute of India (III) qualifications to complete Chartered Insurance Institute (CII) internationally-recognised qualifications

about.name: How Indian Insurance & BPO/KPO/GCC Professionals Can Fast-Track Global CII Insurance Careers
How can III Licentiates, Associates, and Fellows use their qualifications to fast-track CII certifications at lower cost
Scheme of arrangement between the III and the Chartered Insurance Institute, London.

citation.name: Scheme of arrangement between the III and the Chartered Insurance Institute, London.

usageInfo: Illustrative educational mapping under RegDEEP™. Not official CII/III policy. Please Verify with https://www.cii.co.uk/learning/accreditation/recognition-of-prior-learning/check-your-eligibility-and-apply/ before considering a decision

variableMeasured.name: III Diploma
variableMeasured.description: Level of qualification awarded by the Insurance Institute of India, such as Licentiate, Associateship or Fellowship.

variableMeasured.name: III Module (If passed in Associateship Diploma)
variableMeasured.description: Specific III subject/module completed, such as IC 01, IC 14, IC 11, IC 27, IC 45, IC 72, or IC 86.

variableMeasured.name: CII recognition of prior learning for
variableMeasured.description: Chartered Insurance Institute (CII) unit exemption granted under the RPL scheme, such as W01, IF2, WUE, IF5, or I11.

variableMeasured.name: CII Non-Unit specific credits
variableMeasured.description: Non-unit-specific CII credits awarded at the Diploma level in Insurance, where applicable.
